column4: hey guys, our local lug is putting on an ubuntu booth at a show tom. are there any videos of the OS that we can have playing on a few of the machines?
like ones showing off compiz, etc
google is simple way search for ubuntu videos
im not talking about youtube videos, but screencasts of some sort
(we dont have internet access on the video machines)
how about making content yourself, you can use istanbul to record
